title: Dump data from segments.io /segment.com with apikey
content:
I am analyzing an app and in it's data I found an apikey for segments.io.
Using this apikey, is it possible to see what data is stored or perhaps even dump it?

answers_data.content:
Sure. The API endpoint is 
https://api.segment.io/
- it seems to be a REST interface. You can find the software documentation here. Also there seems to be a broad range of integrations to parse and read the data here. Please also know that the system uses a WriteKey and a ReadKey apparently, but I can not deduce which one you have. If you want to write your own REST client, please refer to StackOverflow for programming-guidance. This SE community is dedicated to reverse engineering.
